mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity (resume_id, act_type, title, start_date, end_date, description) VALUES (#{resumeId}, #{actType}, #{title}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{description});
mapper.update: UPDATE activity SET act_type = #{actType}, title = #{title}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, description = #{description} WHERE act_id = #{actId};
